snippet.title: Zero Escape: Zero Time Dilemma Trailer 1
snippet.description:
For more information, please visit: http://zero-escape.com/
________________________________________________________________

Aksys Games and Spike Chunsoft dare you to escape! Zero Time Dilemma will be available for retail and digital on Playstation®Vita handheld entertainment system and Nintendo 3DS hand-held system in the US and digitally for the EU on June 28th, 2016!
